title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 153.1 - Points for float receipt and discharge of cargoes
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 153.1 - Points for float receipt and discharge of cargoes

State Regulations

Terminals are provided for the receipt and discharge of
canal freight at the principal points of shipment. The loading, unloading or
storage of commodities at points on the canal system other than these terminals
shall not be allowed without first obtaining a permit therefor from the Canal

Corporation. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
153.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
